numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph is about kids who contact their parents.
2. Most kids send text messages to their parents.
5. Women have a higher percentage than men for every contact method in the graph.
6. I wonder why men do not send more text messages.
7. I wonder why men do not make more phone calls.
8. I wonder what age range the respondents have.
10. These phones can be used to contact parents.
11. If people do not use these phones to contact parents then people can lose connection with their parents.
12. If people lose connection with their parents then relationships with close people can worsen.
13. The headline is: Do you not have wifi?
